dct_title_s: Map of the seat of war in Africa
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by spot heights. "The Norris Peters Co., photo-litho., Washington, D.C." Includes inset of South Africa.
dct_creator_sm: United States. Adjutant-General's Office. Military Information Division
dct_publisher_sm: [Washington, D.C. : War Dept., Adjutant General's Office, Military Information Division, 1899]
